name: Fusible Plug
description: A safety device designed to melt at a specific temperature to relieve pressure and prevent explosions.

name: Fire Door
description: A door with a fire-resistance rating used to prevent the spread of fire and smoke.

name: Fire Bar
description: A component of a furnace or boiler designed to withstand high temperatures.

name: Burner Electrode
description: An electrode used in burners to ignite the fuel and create a flame.

name: Blow Down Valve
description: A valve used to remove sediment and maintain boiler efficiency.

name: Cooling Fan
description: A fan used to cool machinery or electronics by circulating air.

name: Boiler Mobrey
description: A device used to control the water level in a boiler.

name: Safety Valve
description: A valve that automatically releases pressure to prevent explosions.

name: Pressure Gauge
description: A gauge used to measure the pressure of gases or liquids.

name: Burner Nozzle
description: A nozzle used in burners to direct the flow of fuel.

name: RO Antiscalant
description: A chemical used to prevent scaling in reverse osmosis systems.

name: Sequence Controller
description: A controller used to manage the sequence of operations in a system.

name: Refactory Cement
description: A high-temperature cement used in refractory applications.

name: Boiler Chemical
description: Chemicals used to treat and maintain boiler water quality.

name: CS Globe Valve
description: A cast steel valve used for regulating flow in a pipeline.

name: RO Membrane
description: A semi-permeable membrane used in reverse osmosis systems to filter water.

name: Solar Cell
description: A photovoltaic cell used to convert sunlight into electrical energy.

name: Boiler Coil
description: A coil used in boilers to transfer heat efficiently.

name: Diffuser Plate
description: A plate used to distribute air or gas evenly in a system.

name: Pressure Switch
description: A switch used to monitor and control pressure levels in a system.
